instructions:
After you choose an alien, you will find out whether you got treasure. Which looks like this. 










Press SPACE to continue.

If an alien has a good mine that means it can easily dig up space treasure and it will be very likely to have some to share. It might not have treasure EVERY time you ask, but it will most of the time. Another alien might have a bad mine that is hard to dig through at the moment, and won't have treasure to share most times you ask. 

Press SPACE to continue.

For example, the alien on the yellow planet has a good mine right now. Try asking the left alien for treasure 10 times by pressing the X keys. 

Press SPACE to practice.
